3D Graph Properties Dialog Box

Requires: Full Development System (Windows)

From the front panel of a VI, right-click a 3D graph control and select 3D Graph Properties from the shortcut menu to display this dialog box.

Use this dialog box to format the properties of the 3D graph.

The 3D Graph Properties dialog box includes the following pages:

Graph

Plots

Axes

Value Pairs

Format

Cursors
